entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.89.5
entry.content:
• üîí Added UUID verification to member endpoints not requiring a session (see advisory) - Steve Larson

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.89.4...v5.89.5

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.89.6
entry.content:
• üêõ Fixed editor performance issues in Safari for posts with HTML or Markdown cards (#20806) - Ronald Langeveld

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.89.5...v5.89.6

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.90.0
entry.content:
• üîí Fixed admin forms defaulting to GET method (#20810) - Chris Raible
  • ‚ú® Improved email analytics jobs system (#20809) - Steve Larson
  • ‚ú® Updated email analytics job to prioritize open events (#20800) - Steve Larson
  • üé® Improved the performance of the /members/events/ aggregated_click_event endpoint (#20790) - Princi Vershwal
  • üêõ Fixed shift selection in the posts list (#20818) - Steve Larson
  • üêõ Fixed fetching labels and offers in the editor (#20815) - Steve Larson
  • üêõ Fixed frontend routing prioritizing collections over built in routes (#20765) - Chris Raible

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.89.6...v5.90.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.90.1
